dct_title_s: An accurate map of Africa drawn from the Sieur Robert with improvements
dct_description_sm: Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.

Map extracted from Richard Brookes, The general gazetteer, or, Compendious geographical dictionary ... (London: Printed for J. Newbery, 1766). Information derived from http://www.biblioserver.com/newberry/index.php?m=search (accessed: 5 December 2007).
"Engraved (by the Kings authority) for the Geographical Dictionary."
dct_publisher_sm: Engrav’d by the King’s Authority for the Geographical Dictionary
dct_rights_sm: Image courtesy University of Cape Town Libraries, Special Collections: Maps scanned under the William and Yvonne Jacobson Digital Africana Program at UCT. If you have questions, please contact David Rumsey Map Center at rumseymapcenter@stanford.edu.
